en: Muddy Puddles.
zh: 泥坑

en: It is raining today.
zh: 今天是雨天。

en: So, Peppa and George cannot play outside.
zh: 所以佩奇和乔治不能在外边玩。

en: Daddy, it's stopped raining.
zh: 爸爸，现在雨停了。

en: Can we go out to play?
zh: 我们能出去玩吗？

en: Alright, run along you two.
zh: 好的，你们两个去玩吧。

en: Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里玩。

en: I love muddy puddles.
zh: 我喜欢在泥坑里玩。

en: Peppa. lf you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
zh: 佩奇，如果你要在泥坑里跳，你必须要穿上靴子才行。

en: Sorry, Mummy.
zh: 对不起，妈妈。

en: George likes to jump in muddy puddles, too.
zh: 乔治也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

en: George. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
zh: 乔治，如果你想在泥坑里跳，你必须穿上靴子才行。

en: Peppa likes to look after her little brother, George.
zh: 佩奇喜欢照顾她的弟弟乔治。

en: George, let's find some more puddles.
zh: 乔治，我们再去找几个泥坑跳吧。

en: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
zh: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

en: Peppa has found a little puddle.
zh: 佩奇找到了一个小泥坑。

en: George has found a big puddle.
zh: 乔治找到了一个大泥坑。

en: Look, George. There's a really big puddle.
zh: 你看，乔治。那里有一个很大的泥坑。

en: George wants to jump into the big puddle first.
zh: 乔治想第一个跳到泥坑里去玩。

en: Stop, George.l must check if it's safe for you.
zh: 等一下，乔治。我得检查一下这里安不安全。

en: Good. It is safe for you.
zh: 很好，你可以放心地玩啦。(对你很安全)

en: Sorry, George. It's only mud.
zh: 对不起，乔治。只是些泥而已。

en: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Come on, George. Let's go and show Daddy.
zh: 走，乔治。我们去给爸爸看看。

en: Goodness me.
zh: 我的老天呀。

en: Daddy. Daddy.Guess what we've been doing.
zh: 爸爸，爸爸，你猜猜我们刚才干了些什么。

en: Let me think...
zh: 让我想一想。。。

en: Have you been watching television?
zh: 你们刚才看电视了？

en: No. No. Daddy.
zh: 不对，不对，爸爸。

en: Have you just had a bath?
zh: 你们刚才洗澡了？

en: No. No.
zh: 不对。不对。

en: I know. You've been jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 我知道了。你们刚才在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Yes. Yes. Daddy. We've been jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 没错，没错，爸爸。我们刚才在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Ho. Ho. And look at the mess you're in.
zh: 呵呵，看看你们弄得多脏呀。

en: Oh, well, it's only mud.
zh: 哦，没事，只是些泥而已。

en: Let's clean up quickly before Mummy sees the mess.
zh: 快清理干净，别让妈妈看到那么脏。（在妈妈看到前弄干净）

en: Daddy, when we've cleaned up, will you and Mummy come and play, too?
zh: 爸爸，我们清理干净以后，你和妈妈也会一起来玩吗？

en: Yes, we can all play in the garden.
zh: 是的，我们都可以在花园玩。

en: Peppa and George are wearing their boots.
zh: 佩奇和乔治穿着他们的靴子。

en: Mummy and Daddy are wearing their boots.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸也穿着他们的靴子。

en: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
zh: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
zh: 每个人都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Oh, Daddy pig,look at the mess you're in.
zh: 哦，猪爸爸，瞧瞧你身上多脏呀。

en: It’s only mud.
zh: 只是些泥而已。
